title: Drawing, "The Infant Hercules Strangling the Serpent", 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of black chalk on light blue paper
markings: Watermark: lily in double oval; F above oval.
inscribed: Inscribed: ercole bambino strozza due serpenti
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Alcmene and Amphitryon shown leaving their bed. Lamp stands at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Infant Hercules Strangling the Serpent", 1813.
1813. Pen and brown ink over traces of black chalk on light blue paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3228.
